original_text: Then Jacob was greatly afraid and distressed: and he divided the people that was with him, and the flocks, and herds, and the camels, into two bands;
korean_text: 야곱이 심히 두렵고 답답하여 자기와 함께 한 동행자와 양과 소와 낙타를 두 떼로 나누고

sentences.original_text: and he divided the people that was with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기와 함께 있던 사람들을 나누고

sentences.original_text: and the flocks, and herds, and the camels,
